includedAssets.title: The Smurfs
includedAssets.synopsis: Magical creatures Jonathan Winters and Katy Perry are having the Smurf of their lives as they flee from evil wizard Hank Azaria.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Magical creatures Jonathan Winters and Katy Perry are having the Smurf of their lives as they flee from evil wizard Hank Azaria.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Magical creatures Jonathan Winters and Katy Perry are having the Smurf of their lives as they flee from evil wizard Hank Azaria.

includedAssets.title: The Smurfs 2
includedAssets.synopsis: Evil wizard Gargamel kidnaps Smurfette so she can turn his mischievous Smurf-like creatures into real Smurfs. Madcap mix of live action and animation.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Evil wizard Gargamel kidnaps Smurfette so she can turn his cheeky Smurf-like creatures into real Smurfs. Madcap mix of live action and animation.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Evil wizard Gargamel kidnaps Smurfette so she can turn his mischievous Smurf-like creatures into real Smurfs. Madcap mix of live action and animation.

includedAssets.title: The Smurfs Christmas Carol
includedAssets.synopsis: Grouchy Smurf gets a visit from the Ghosts of Christmas Past, Present and Future in order to get him into the seasonal spirit. Animated festive fun with the Smurf gang.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Grouchy Smurf gets a visit from the Ghosts of Christmas Past, Present and Future in order to get him into the seasonal spirit. Animated festive fun.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Grouchy Smurf gets a visit from the Ghosts of Christmas Past, Present and Future in order to get him into the seasonal spirit. Animated festive fun with the Smurf gang.

includedAssets.title: The Smurfs: The Legend of Smurfy Hollow
includedAssets.synopsis: In this spooky family animation, the loveable Smurf buddies enter the woods, leading to a ghostly encounter with the Headless Horseman.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: In this spooky family animation, the loveable Smurf buddies enter the woods, leading to a ghostly encounter with the Headless Horseman.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: In this spooky family animation, the loveable Smurf buddies enter the woods, leading to a ghostly encounter with the Headless Horseman.

includedAssets.title: The Smurfs 1-4 Box Set
includedAssets.synopsis: The tiny blue Smurfs take their battle with Gargamel to New York City and Paris, teaming up with the Winslows (Neil Patrick Harris and Jayma Mays) to defeat the evil wizard. Animated/live action family adventure featuring the voices of Jonathan Winters, Alan Cumming, Katy Perry and Fred Armisen.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The Smurfs head to New York and Paris to battle the evil Gargamel. Family fun with Neil Patrick Harris, Jayma Mays, Jonathan Winters and Katy Perry.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The tiny blue Smurfs take their battle with Gargamel to New York City and Paris, teaming up with the Winslows (Neil Patrick Harris and Jayma Mays) to defeat the evil wizard. Animated/live action family adventure featuring the voices of Jonathan Winters, Alan Cumming, Katy Perry and Fred Armisen.
